api_list.name: forecast daily
api_list.description: The forecast API returns the geocode weather forecasts for the current day up to the endpoint duration in days.

api_list.name: forecast hourly
api_list.description: The forecast API returns the geocode weather forecasts for the current day up to the endpoint duration in hours.

api_list.name: historical 30 days
api_list.description: The Historical Conditions are generated from The Weather Company (TWC) Currents On Demand (COD) system. The API provides information on temperature, precipitation and other related weather observations elements as well as date/time, weather icon codes and phrases.

api_list.name: covid19
api_list.description: Allows you to view the current state of a disease for a set of countries globally
